title: Sex
lyrics:
[Intro]
What you gon' do without my sex?

You too busy with that chick that you just met
What you gon' do without my sex?
You just trying to forget
The way I fucked you good
But you just came and left
What you gon' do without my sex?

What you gon' do without my sex?
Yeah, what you gon' do without my sex?
(Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex)
Let's talk about sex, baby
Let's talk about you, what you gon' do without my sex?
(Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex)
Let's talk about sex, baby
Let's talk about you, what you gon' do without my sex?

You'rе such a bitch
How could you fall in love with her?
I hope shе breaks your fucking heart

Don't text me shit

You shoulda thought about one thing before you left
What you gon' do without my sex?
You're gonna go crazy I bet
'Cause every time that I was on top of you
Told me I'm the best
What you gon' do next
You ain't gon' get no text from your ex
'Cause I don't even care
Boy, you got a tiny dick, so next

What you gon' do without my sex?
(Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex)
Let's talk about sex, baby
Let's talk about you, what you gon' do without my sex?
(Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex)
Let's talk about sex, baby
Let's talk about you, what you gon' do without my sex?

You stupid boy
What are you ever gonna do?
Without me taking care of you
I guess that promo got to you

But your head sucks
Make you feel like a million bucks
But fuck the checks
And fuck the rest
[Chorus]
What you gon' do without my sex?
(Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex)
Let's talk about sex, baby

(Sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex, sex)
Let's talk about sex, baby
Let's talk about you, what you gon' do without my sex?
